Text:
I was not satisfied AT FIRST with this product. After posting a less than glowing review, I was immediately contacted by the seller (distributor). They graciously sent a new "fresher" bag of coffee. This is much closer to what I remember. Try with sweetened condensed milk as suggested, it is served that way in Jamaica. Now if I only had some coco bread to go with it.

Thank you for the prompt, courteous service.
